      • GamePlayer

        public GamePlayer​(java.lang.String name,
                  int priority,
                  int hitPoints)
        Constructor to create a GamePlayer.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the player in the UI
        priority - how early in the turn the player can act
        hitPoints - player's starting number of hitpoints

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn​(Actions actions,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        Play a turn by displaying a menu to the user and getting their selected Action returned. If it is stunned, can only skip its current action until the stun effect is gone (after 2 stuns). Otherwise, it runs the default implementation of a Player.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class Player
        Parameters:
        actions - the actions to display
        map - the map to display
        display - the object that performs the console I/O
        Returns:
        a list of actions that the player is able to perform

      • addStunPowder

        public static void addStunPowder​(Item stunPowder)
        Adds a StunPowder into the list of recognizable stunPowders as references.
        Parameters:
        stunPowder - an Item signifying the StunPowder
